sentences.en: A lot of information can be retained in your computer.
sentences.cn: 电脑可以储存很多信息。

sentences.en: Amid the attention, Martin managed to retain some privacy.
sentences.cn: 在这种万人瞩目的情况下, 马丁还是设法享有一些清静.

sentences.en: Banks retain youngsters'loyalty and continued patronage in the future.
sentences.cn: 银行获得孩子们的信任,使他们在将来继续惠顾银行.

sentences.en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentences.cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentences.en: Disney will retain a 51 percent controlling interest in the venture.
sentences.cn: 迪斯尼将保留该项目51%的控股权。

sentences.en: He has managed to retain most of his fortune.
sentences.cn: 他设法保存了他的大部分财产.

sentences.en: He is likely to retain the England captaincy.
sentences.cn: 他有望继续担任英格兰队队长。

sentences.en: I find it very difficult to retain facts.
sentences.cn: 我觉得具体事实很难记住。

sentences.en: It is suffient to retain only the first two digits.
sentences.cn: 只需取头两位数字就够了.

sentences.en: Limestone is known to retain moisture.
sentences.cn: 人们知道石灰岩能储存水分。

sentences.en: Retain copies of all correspondence, since you may need them at a later date.
sentences.cn: 要保留好所有信件的副本，日后可能会用到。

sentences.en: The bank has taken further steps to retain control over the value of the pound.
sentences.cn: 这家银行已采取进一步措施来保持对英镑购买力的控制.

sentences.en: The leather may need to be oiled every two to three weeks in order to retain its suppleness.
sentences.cn: 为了保持皮革的柔韧性，可能两三周就要上一次油。

sentences.en: The state wants to retain control of food imports.
sentences.cn: 政府想保留对食品进口的控制权。

sentences.en: They built a wall round the shore of the lake to retain the water.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着湖边筑起一道堤来挡水.

sentences.en: They strive to retain access to the resources that make company tick.
sentences.cn: 他们设法获取公司赖以运转的资源.

sentences.en: This season I expect us to retain the championship and win the European Cup.
sentences.cn: 这个赛季我期待我们能够保住冠军头衔，赢得欧洲杯。

sentences.en: to retain your independence
sentences.cn: 保持独立

sentences.en: Vegetables should retain some firmness and should not be soggy and waterlogged.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜应保持一定的硬挺度，不应潮乎乎的浸透了水。

sentences.en: You have the right to retain possession of the goods.
sentences.cn: 你有权保留这些物品。

words.tran_cn: 保持器；家臣；保持者；[机] 护圈；预付费用

trans.tran_cn: 保持，留在心中，记住，雇用，付定金保留
trans.tran_en: to keep something or continue to have something
